_comment: V3.1: This template is for a consulting role, using trait-specific instructions. This version has a corrected and complete education section.
summary: {Instruction: Write a powerful 2-3 sentence summary for a top-tier consulting role. Directly mirror the language and keywords from the job description and showcase a blend of the 4 key consulting traits: Problem-solving, Personal impact, Entrepreneurial drive, and Leadership. Keep it concise and under 50 words.}

description.instruction: {Instruction: Start with a leadership-focused verb (e.g., Led, Directed, Spearheaded). Rewrite this achievement to highlight **Leadership** and **Entrepreneurial Drive**. Elaborate on the scope of your leadership (e.g., team size, project budget). Structure to show the action, result, and metric. Max 35 words / 250 chars.}

{Instruction: Start with an analytical verb (e.g., Analyzed, Engineered, Modeled). Rewrite this achievement to highlight **Problem-solving**. Elaborate on the specific analytical methods or technologies used to achieve the outcome. Structure to show the action, result, and metric. Max 35 words / 250 chars.}

{Instruction: Start with an influential verb (e.g., Advised, Guided, Presented). Rewrite this achievement to highlight **Personal Impact**. Elaborate on the seniority of the stakeholders you influenced and the nature of your recommendation. Structure to show the action, result, and metric. Max 35 words / 250 chars.}

{Instruction: Start with an entrepreneurial verb (e.g., Launched, Created, Established). Rewrite this achievement to showcase the creation of a new program or initiative and quantify its success. Max 35 words / 250 chars.}

{Instruction: Start with a research-focused verb (e.g., Identified, Uncovered, Assessed). Rewrite this achievement to highlight the use of market research or analysis to solve a problem. Max 35 words / 250 chars.}

{Instruction: Start with a verb showing technical leadership (e.g., Architected, Designed, Implemented). Rewrite this achievement to highlight **Problem-solving**. Elaborate on the complexity of the framework and how it empowered your team. Quantify the ROI or efficiency gain. Max 35 words / 250 chars.}

{Instruction: Start with an analytical verb (e.g., Conducted, Analyzed, Modeled). Rewrite this achievement to highlight **Personal Impact**. Briefly explain why this analysis was important for the business's strategic shift. Max 35 words / 250 chars.}

{Instruction: Start with a technical verb (e.g., Built, Automated, Engineered). Rewrite this achievement to highlight **Problem-solving**. Mention the key technologies used in the ETL pipelines that enabled the business function. Max 35 words / 250 chars.}

education.school: {Instruction: From the base resume data, fill in the name of the first university (York University).}
education.field: {Instruction: Fill in the first field of study, ensuring it is 'Marketing & Brand Management and Management Consulting'.}
education.date: {Instruction: Fill in the dates for the first degree.}
education.awards: {Instruction: From the base resume data, detail the competitive award for the first degree, specifying the level of competition (e.g., '1 of 500 applicants').}

education.school: {Instruction: From the base resume data, fill in the name of the second university (University of Calgary).}
education.field: {Instruction: Fill in the second field of study (Biological Sciences).}
education.date: {Instruction: Fill in the dates for the second degree.}
education.awards: {Instruction: From the base resume data, detail the competitive award for the second degree.}

extracurricular_achievements.organization: {Instruction: From the base resume data, fill in the name of the extracurricular organization.}
extracurricular_achievements.role: {Instruction: From the base resume data, fill in the role held.}
extracurricular_achievements.date: {Instruction: From the base resume data, fill in the dates.}
description: {Instruction: Trait: Leadership. Start with a leadership action verb (e.g., Mentored, Coached, Organized). Rewrite the description from the base resume to showcase leadership in a non-professional context. Elaborate on the activity and quantify the impact (e.g., number of people led). Max 30 words / 200 chars.}

skills.technical: {Instruction: From the base resume data, list the most relevant technical skills. Prioritize skills mentioned in the job description. Example: Python (Pandas), SQL, Tableau.}
skills.languages: {Instruction: From the base resume data, list languages and proficiency levels. Example: English (Native), French (Fluent).}
skills.interests: {Instruction: From the base resume data, list 2-3 unique, specific interests that are good conversation starters (e.g., 'Competitive Marathon Runner').}

personal_information._comment: This data will be merged from your base resume data file, not generated by the AI.
